001package net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013
014public class Mark1 {
015
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        Perceptron mark1 = Perceptron.create(400, 512, 8);
018        mark1.accept(new PerceptronInitializer());
019
020        DataSet<Float> dataSet = new LinesAndCircles().load();
021        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
022        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
023        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
024        epochRmePlotter.display();
025        Regime regime = Regimes.epochs(10,
026                epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")"),
027                epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)).stochastic();
028        Trainer<Perceptron, Float> trainer = Trainer.of(new PerceptronInitializer(), null, new PerceptronUpdateRule(), regime);
029        trainer.train(mark1, trainingSet);
030
031        int i = 0;
032        int correct = 0;
033        int wrong = 0;
034        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
035            i++;
036            Float[] estimate = mark1.estimate(sample.features());
037            if (Arrays.equals(estimate, sample.targetOutputs())) {
038                correct++;
039            } else {
040                String label = createLabel(i, sample, estimate);
041                ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
042                image.display();
043                wrong++;
044            }
045        }
046        if (wrong == 0) {
047            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = testSet.samples().getFirst();
048            Float[] estimate = mark1.estimate(sample.features());
049            String label = createLabel(1, sample, estimate);
050            ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
051            image.display();
052        }
053        System.out.println("Correct: " + correct + ", Wrong: " + wrong + ", Total: " + (correct + wrong));
054    }
055
056    private static String createLabel(int i, DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, Float[] estimate) {
057        String label = "";
058        boolean wrong = false;
059        label += estimate[0] == 1.0f ? "Circle " : "Line ";
060        if (!JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.equals(sample.targetOutputs()[0], estimate[0])) {
061            wrong = true;
062        }
063        label += estimate[1] == 1.0f ? "Left" : "Right";
064        if (!JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT.equals(sample.targetOutputs()[1], estimate[1])) {
065            wrong = true;
066        }
067        return i + ". " + (wrong ? "X: " : "V: ") + label;
068    }
069
070}
